articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: How Hezbollah is trying to counter Israel's high-tech surveillance - Reuters
From Dr. Oz to heart valves: A tiny device charted a contentious path through the FDA - CBS News
articles.description: The story of MitraClip, a device Dr. Oz helped invent to treat faulty heart valves, is a cautionary tale about the science, business and regulation of medical technology.
articles.content: In 2013, the FDA approved an implantable device to treat leaky heart valves. Among its inventors was Mehmet Oz, the former television personality and former U.S. Senate candidate widely known as "Dr.… [+13870 chars]
